common.gatekeeperBlock: Please modify your input and try again.

dashboard.startByPasting: Start by pasting your notes or customer conversations.

home.tagline: Simple marketing content for your local business.
home.intro: Enter your business details and get auto-generated strategy, platform-ready post copy, and images. Supports Xiaohongshu, WeChat Moments, and more—ideal for local shops, salons, and service businesses.

business.tellUsHint: This helps us generate content that fits your industry and audience.
business.scenarioPlaceholder: e.g. customer conversations, service descriptions, FAQs (optional)
business.name: Business name
business.materialsUploadHint: Flyers, brochures, or designs. PDF, JPEG, PNG, WebP. Max 10MB each.
business.choosePlatformsSubtitle: Select up to 2 platforms where you want to generate posts.
business.whyTwoInfo: Why 2? In MVP, limiting platforms helps us maintain quality, keep costs manageable, and ensure stable service for everyone.
business.platformsHint: You'll get more options after strategy.

ingest.pasteHint: Add customer conversations, work notes, FAQs, or any text you'd like to turn into social posts.
ingest.privacyDetail: Don't paste sensitive personal data (phone numbers, email addresses, home addresses). We scrub common PII patterns before processing and before AI generation.

strategy.title: Marketing strategy
strategy.recommendedPlatformsHint: Recommended for your business. Select up to 2.

calendar.title: Content calendar
calendar.subtitle: Your one-month schedule. Log in and click a slot to generate that post.
calendar.noPosts: No planned posts. Select 2 platforms first.

post.caption: Caption
post.candidateImagesHint: These thumbnails are structural drafts, not final images. Final high-quality images will be generated after you select.
post.placeholder: Caption will appear here after generation.
post.quotaExceeded: You've reached the limit of 2 posts per platform per week. Try again next week.
post.budgetExceeded: Monthly API budget reached. Try again later.
post.imageServiceUnconfigured: Image generation is not configured. Add REPLICATE_API_TOKEN to your environment.
post.imageGenerationFailed: Image generation failed. Check REPLICATE_API_TOKEN and the post-images Storage bucket.
post.candidateGallery: Candidate images (select up to 9 in the next step)
post.finalizeLimitExceeded: Budget limit: you can improve at most {{n}} images this month.
post.downloadImagesHint: Open each image above in a new tab, then right‑click to save.
post.firstUseMessage: Thanks! We'll ask for your feedback in about 2 weeks.

feedback.invitationBody: You've been using HivePost for a while. A quick rating and a few words help us improve.
feedback.rating: How would you rate your experience? (1–5)
